title: Fastify plugin media-endpoint options
description: Options for the Fastify media-endpoint plugin

delete.title: Delete post
delete.description: [Deletes](https://micropub.spec.indieweb.org/#delete) a post published at a URL.

includeErrorDescription.description: Whether to include an `error_description` property in all error responses. This is meant to assist the client developer in understanding the error. This is NOT meant to be shown to the end user.

isAccessTokenRevoked.title: isAccessTokenRevoked
isAccessTokenRevoked.description: Predicate function that returns true if a jti (JSON Web Token ID) is revoked.

multipartFormDataMaxFileSize.title: multipart/form-data max file size
multipartFormDataMaxFileSize.description: Max file size (in bytes) for multipart/form-data requests.

reportAllAjvErrors.description: Whether to report all AJV validation errors.
reportAllAjvErrors.title: report all AJV errors

contentType.description: Content-Type of the file being uploaded to the Media endpoint.

filename.description: Name of the file being uploaded to the Media endpoint. The Media Endpoint MAY ignore the suggested filename that the client sends.
